//Cosmetics "animation": "1", "lineThickness": "2", "paletteColors": "#0075c2", "baseFontColor": "#333333", "baseFont": "Helvetica Neue,Arial", "captionFontSize": "14", "subcaptionFontSize": "14", "subcaptionFontBold": "0", "showBorder": "0", "rotateLabels": "1", "slantLabels": "1", "labelStep": "2", "bgColor": "#ffffff", "showShadow": "1", "canvasBgColor": "#ffffff", "canvasBorderAlpha": "0", "divlineAlpha": "100", "divlineColor": "#999999", "divlineThickness": "1", "divLineDashed": "1", "divLineDashLen": "1", "divLineGapLen": "1", "showXAxisLine": "1", "yAxisValuesStep": "1", "showValues": "0", "xAxisLineThickness": "1", "xAxisLineColor": "#999999", "showAlternateHGridColor": "0", "numbersuffix": "mm"
}, "data": [{SENSOR_VALUES_LABEL_COUNTS}] } } ); // Render the chart mychart.render('chart-container'); }); </script> </head> <body> <div id="chart-container">Chart Loads here!!</div> </body> </html>
